StudyEventDef.Name: Klinische Dokumentation Med. V - Follow Up - Lymphom

Description.TranslatedText: Current family name of the patient at the day of reporting
Any academic title of a patient, all abbreviated and separated by "space". Examples: I.E; B.S; MD;Prof.; etc
Any suffix to a patient name. Examples: Baron of ; Lady; Baronesse; of; van; etc
Given names of a patient. More than one given name may be separated by "space"
Family name of patient at birth
Any previous names of a patient, maybe separated by "space"
Differentiation of a person by sexual characteristics
Day month and year of a patientÂ´s birth according to gregorian calendar

Question.TranslatedText: General classification of the diagnosed lymphoma
